//: These are meant to be personal pictures with family or friends. The sort of things you would have in a picture frame around the house. Nothing anomalous or Cataclysm-related should show up in these pictures; however, they could be linked to game lore, locations, or events. Feel free to contribute more, as this gives more variety to houses and people from before the Cataclysm.

text.text: A brightly lit photo depicting several large pine trees.  A beautiful brunette-haired woman is standing next to a small grey owl on a wooden perch.  She seems nervous standing next to the scowling owl.
A man in a polo shirt and sunglasses stands in front of a fence, holding a leafy branch.  The man grins ear to ear as a giraffe reaches down and messily chews the leaves off of the branch.

This is a worn family photo.  A group of people stand in front of a pier next to a shimmering lake.  In the rear center of the crowd stands a tall, well-built man in his 60s.  He is flanked by six children of various ages, all smiling awkwardly for the camera.
This blurry photo appears to have been taken at some sort of party.  A group of three people strike goofy poses as a bride and groom laugh heartily in the background.

A family photo of a snowy morning.  Two young girls, bundled up in heavy winter clothing, stand in front of a mountain far in the background — which mountain it was, you couldn't say.  The girls are cheerfully smiling.

A photo of a group of young people in costumes.  They are all dressed in various anime character costumes and are striking poses for the camera.  In the background, the entrance of a convention center has, written large on its entrance, 'Animaine'.

A looming storm dominates the space of this photo; dark clouds are scattered, promising miserable rain.  Towards the bottom right of the photo stands a bearded man in a raincoat, carrying a fishing rod in one hand and a hooked fish in the other.  He is brightly lit by the camera's flash, which reveals his broad grin.  Written in permanent marker on the picture frame is the phrase, 'In and out just in time!'

Two adult men stand front and center in this picture, comically covered all over in small splashes of paint and wearing paintball masks.  Two boys and a girl surround them with masks still on, cheerfully holding their paintball guns in the air in celebration of victory.

A smiling young woman wearing a band t-shirt is in the driver seat of a car, with an older man sitting in the passenger seat next to her, sweating profusely.  Written in colorful sharpie at the bottom of the frame is, 'Dad teaching me how to drive a manual for my drivers licence'.
Two dogs are perched on a couch.  One appears to be a rottweiler; the other is a black corgi mix.  Both are staring hungrily at the chip the photographer is holding just below the camera.

A photograph of an open field of verdant grass.  A golden retriever is joyfully chasing a young boy through the field.  The boy is smiling and trailing a small piece of rope as he runs, and the dog seems intent on catching it.  Written in black marker is 'James at grandpa's ranch.'

A framed clipping of a local newspaper article.  Displayed in bold font, the headline reads, 'Local Firefighter Saves Family of 7 from House Fire!'  A picture of a burning house surrounded by firetrucks and scrambling firefighters is displayed in full color.
A framed clipping of a newspaper article.  It's a picture of an opening ceremony for a pristine park, with a group of people standing behind the ribbon spanning the entrance, just as it is being cut.
A framed clipping of a newspaper article.  'Annual Chilli Cook-off Winner'.  Enclosed is a small article about the winner and the secret recipe.
An old black-and-white photo from many years ago.  It features a group of people at a long table dressed for a fancy dinner party.  Inscribed across it is 'Grey Moose Lodge Christmas Party 1973.'

A picture of a group of several people at a painting class.  They each display their attempt at painting a sunset over waves.  The people are smiling and laughing at the varied quality of each painting, with wine glasses perched in one hand and their pictures in the other.
A picture of a house under construction.  Several men are evidently in the midst of working on the building; however, they have all stopped to face the camera and smile for the picture.
A picture of a Renaissance Fair.  A petite woman in ornate mediaeval clothing is holding a gigantic turkey leg and dramatically biting into it with exaggerated force.

An older black man with a greying beard sits proudly on a chopper motorcycle, his beaming smile directed towards the camera.  To his side are several other men on their own motorcycles, smiling in the same manner.  Scribbled on the photo's edge is 'Told you we could fix it up!'

This appears to be a photo of a woman a distance away from a city.  She's taking a selfie and trying to get as much of the city in frame as possible as the clouds hover over the town, with the sun beaming between them gloriously.
A photo of a large crowd enjoying an air show.  Several jets streak overhead high in the distant sky.
A photo of eight people celebrating some manner of victory.  They are in the lobby of an escape room and have 'Secret of the Tomb' 'completed in 57 minutes and 12 seconds' displayed behind them.
A worn painting.  It depicts a brown deer running through trees and is signed, 'A. Whitmer'.
A framed family photo.  The family stands together among autumn leaves.  They stand in front of a large house with pillars near the front door.
A framed photo of a beautiful woman gazing sadly out of view.  She is looking downward, and her profile is partly obscured by her hair.
A framed sketch of a young couple.  They are seated on a bench and are embracing each other lovingly.

This is a jigsaw puzzle that has been glued and framed.  It depicts a chestnut brown horse trotting towards the foreground and a cloudy blue sky above.  You can't help but wonder how long it took to finish it.
This is an ink impression of a pair of baby feet.  'Congratulations, grandpa!' is written in exuberant cursive.
A photo of a laughing mother hugging her mud-covered son.  He's covered from head to toe and is squinting from behind his mud-caked face.
A photo of a young girl playing a cello almost as large as she is.  Her sister stands behind her, smiling for the camera.
A framed photo of a dog—it's a slightly bug-eyed mutt with a goofy expression.  Printed on the wooden frame is 'Missing you every day.'
A photo of a man standing atop a large rock on a beach's shore, waving to the camera.  You can see a small city and piers in the distance behind him.
A framed newspaper article.  'New Restaurant Opened by Famous Chef'.  A middle-aged woman stands proudly in front of the restaurant's doors, gesturing as if to welcome the viewer within.
This is an amateur still-life painting depicting a table of fruit and a bottle of wine.  It is signed 'V.A.' in the bottom right.
A gloomy painting of a man in a boat during a storm.  The man is rowing towards a lighthouse in the distance.
A photo of a man in a chef's hat and apron, proudly holding up a tray of freshly baked cookies. A small girl stands beside him, sneaking a cookie from the tray with a mischievous grin.
A picture of an older couple sitting on a porch swing. The man is gently strumming a guitar while the woman rests her head on his shoulder, both smiling contentedly.
A photo of three generations of women in a kitchen, rolling out dough together. Flour is scattered everywhere, and they all look incredibly happy.
A candid photo of a man and his son working on a car engine together. Both are covered in grease and laughing at some shared joke.
A family portrait taken at a beach, with the sun setting in the background. The family is standing in a line, all holding hands, with the waves gently lapping at their feet.
A framed picture of a young woman in a graduation cap and gown, holding her diploma high in the air with a huge smile on her face.
A photo of a father and daughter at a science fair. The daughter is holding a trophy, and behind them is a complex project involving a volcano model.
A black and white photo of a young couple dancing at their wedding. The bride's dress is twirling around them, and they are gazing into each other's eyes.
A picture of two boys fishing at a lake. One boy is holding up a small fish he just caught, and the other is clapping in excitement.
A photo of a woman in hiking gear, standing triumphantly at the peak of a mountain, with a breathtaking view of the valley below her.
A candid shot of a family having a picnic in a park. The parents are lying on a blanket while the children are playing catch nearby.
A photo of a toddler taking their first steps, with a proud mother and father cheering in the background.
A framed picture of a family reunion. A large group of people of all ages are gathered together in front of an old farmhouse, smiling at the camera.
A picture of a young boy and girl, dressed as pirates, standing on a makeshift ship made out of cardboard boxes in their backyard.
A photo of a woman painting a landscape on an easel set up in a meadow. She looks peaceful and focused on her work.
A picture of a man playing fetch with his dog at a park. The dog is mid-jump, about to catch a frisbee in its mouth.
A photo of a young girl in a ballet costume, striking a pose with a proud smile on her face, with her family clapping in the background.
A framed picture of a couple standing in front of their first home, holding a 'Sold' sign and beaming with pride.
A candid photo of a group of friends sitting around a campfire, roasting marshmallows and laughing.
A picture of a little boy dressed as a firefighter, sitting in the driver's seat of a fire truck, looking thrilled.
A photo of a woman and her teenage daughter shopping at a farmers' market. They are both holding baskets filled with fresh produce.
A framed picture of a family playing in the snow, building a snowman together. The snowman has a carrot nose and a scarf, and the family looks delighted.
A photo of a father and son building a treehouse in their backyard. The son is holding a hammer and looking determined, while the father watches proudly.
A picture of a woman gardening in her backyard, surrounded by blooming flowers. She has dirt on her hands and a big smile on her face.
A photo of a group of friends at a barbecue. They are all holding plates of food and laughing, with a grill smoking in the background.
A framed picture of a couple dancing in their living room, with their toddler clapping and laughing nearby.
A photo of a young boy proudly holding up a soccer trophy, with his teammates and coach cheering behind him.
A picture of a family visiting a pumpkin patch. The children are sitting on a large pumpkin, while the parents stand behind them, smiling.
A photo of a group of people playing volleyball on the beach. The sun is setting, and everyone looks like they are having a great time.
A picture of a young girl blowing out the candles on her birthday cake, surrounded by friends and family.
A photo of a man and woman on a tandem bicycle, riding through a scenic trail with autumn leaves falling around them.
A framed picture of a young woman in a karate uniform, holding a black belt and smiling proudly.
A photo of a couple standing in front of the Eiffel Tower, both holding ice cream cones and looking incredibly happy.
A picture of a father and his children baking cookies in the kitchen. Flour and cookie cutters are scattered all over the counter.
A photo of a family having a water balloon fight in their backyard. Everyone is soaked and laughing.
A picture of a grandmother knitting in a rocking chair, with a young girl sitting at her feet, watching intently.
A photo of a family visiting a zoo. They are standing in front of an elephant enclosure, with the elephants in the background.
A picture of a young boy playing the piano, with sheet music scattered around him and a look of concentration on his face.
A photo of a couple sharing a kiss under a gazebo at a park, with a lake and ducks in the background.
A picture of a young girl dressed as a princess, standing in front of a castle at a theme park.
A photo of a group of people skydiving. They are all mid-air, with wide grins and the landscape far below them.
A picture of a family visiting a museum. They are standing in front of a large dinosaur skeleton, looking awestruck.
A photo of a man and his dog sitting on a dock, fishing rods in hand, with the sunset reflecting off the lake.
A picture of a young boy holding a frog he just caught, with a big smile and a muddy face.
A photo of a group of friends playing board games around a table, with snacks and drinks scattered around.
A picture of a couple hiking in the mountains, standing on a cliff with a breathtaking view behind them.
A photo of a woman holding a newborn baby, with a look of pure joy and love on her face.
A picture of a family gathered around a Christmas tree, opening presents and wearing festive sweaters.
A photo of a man and woman dancing in a ballroom, dressed in elegant attire, with other couples dancing around them.
A picture of a young girl riding a horse at a ranch, with a proud instructor walking beside her.
A photo of a couple standing in front of a lighthouse, with the ocean waves crashing behind them.
A picture of a group of friends on a roller coaster, with their hands in the air and faces filled with excitement.
A photo of a family at a baseball game, with the father and son wearing matching team jerseys and caps.
A picture of a young woman playing a violin at a concert, with a focused expression and a spotlight on her.
A photo of a couple sharing a picnic in a park, with a blanket spread out and a basket of food between them.
A picture of a group of people participating in a marathon, with determination and sweat on their faces.
A photo of a family decorating a Christmas tree together, with ornaments and lights scattered around.
A picture of a man and woman kayaking on a river, with life jackets on and paddles in hand.
A photo of a group of children performing in a school play, with costumes and a handmade set in the background.
A picture of a family watching fireworks on the 4th of July, with the sky lit up in colorful explosions.
A photo of a woman and her dog hiking through a forest, with both looking happy and energetic.
A picture of a family riding bikes together on a trail, with helmets on and big smiles.
A photo of a couple celebrating their anniversary at a fancy restaurant, with candles and wine glasses on the table.
A picture of a young boy and girl playing in a sandbox, with toy trucks and shovels scattered around.
A photo of a couple sharing a romantic dinner on a balcony, with a city skyline lit up behind them.
A picture of a family camping in a forest, sitting around a campfire with marshmallows on sticks.
A photo of a man and woman snorkeling in crystal clear water, with colorful fish swimming around them.
A picture of a young girl dressed as a fairy, with wings and a wand, standing in a garden.
A photo of a family ice skating at an outdoor rink, holding hands and smiling.
A picture of a man playing the drums at a concert, with stage lights and a cheering crowd.
A photo of a woman doing yoga on a beach at sunrise, with a serene expression on her face.
A picture of a family visiting a theme park, standing in front of a roller coaster and holding souvenir cups.
A photo of a group of friends having a barbecue in a backyard, with a grill smoking and plates of food on a table.
A picture of a young boy and girl building a sandcastle at the beach, with buckets and shovels in hand.
A photo of a couple sharing a kiss under a waterfall, with mist and greenery all around.
A picture of a family visiting a farm, petting goats and feeding chickens.
A photo of a man and woman dancing in the rain, looking happy and carefree.
A picture of a young girl holding a trophy at a spelling bee, with a big smile and proud parents behind her.
A photo of a couple sharing a romantic boat ride on a lake, with oars in hand and a sunset in the background.
A picture of a group of friends hiking through a forest, with backpacks and walking sticks.
A photo of a young boy and girl flying kites in a park, with colorful kites soaring in the sky.
A picture of a family visiting a historical site, with old buildings and informative plaques in the background.
A photo of a couple sharing a romantic dinner on a rooftop, with a city skyline lit up behind them.
A picture of a family riding bikes together on a trail, with helmets on and big smiles.
A photo of a young girl holding a bouquet of flowers, standing in a garden.
A picture of a man and woman on a tandem bicycle, riding through a scenic trail with autumn leaves falling around them.
A photo of a family playing in the snow, building a snowman together. The snowman has a carrot nose and a scarf, and the family looks delighted.
